divs: Sighting DetailsMy 2 brothers my 2 sisters and I were playing in the front yard. We had a bikerace to our corner. when we got there we saw a large glowing disk. It washumming, buzzing, and made a whineing sound. At first I thought of it to be ablimp. Then I heard it buzz. It hoovered there for 2 minutes then it started tomove.I was amazed. I ran to my house to get my camera. Then I saw it inside mybackyard. I took a picture. then it vanished right out of the sky. When I tookthe film in the pictures diddnt come out. that is what I saw
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around November 13th 2001
